evidence.text: mediation of this case that took place on Monday, October 28, 2024, resulted in a full and final settlement of all claims as to all parties subject to the final consideration and approval by the City of Fort Lauderdale City Commission.

extracted.value: October 28, 2024: Full and final settlement of all claims

evidence.text: PAPERLESS ORDER on Joint Status Update to the Court. The parties have notified the Court that the settlement in this matter was approved by City officials and that the parties are currently working to finalize settlement documentation.
ORDER ADMINISTRATIVELY CLOSING CASE AND REQUIRING STATUS UPDATE. Signed by Judge Rodolfo A. Ruiz II on 11/7/2024. See attached document for full details.
FINAL MEDIATION REPORT held before Mediator Hanzmann. Prepared by: Scott Alexander. Filed by City of Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Disposition: Settled in full.
pursuant to City Ordinance, the settlement requires final consideration and approval by the City of Fort Lauderdale City Commission.
